name: Vacío (Ike)
description:
Cancelled game project worked on between 2016-2018.  Was originally intended to be a portfolio peice for an application to a game production masters degree program at the U of U.

Development stopped in 2018, was originally intending to have a 4th section with an AI partner, as well as music and sound, but these never came about.

Art and animation commissioned from @2dchaos, additional programming done by @koboldskeep
